name: Overwhelmail
description:
You have to help some people to speak together. You're the computer which deliver Emails from the sender to the addressee. But the game gets harder and harder as more and more people send Emails, pictures, attachment and viruses.

Gameplay:

You need to redirect the emails to their addressee, to reform the pictures and to join the attachments files to the emails if they don't have any viruses.

Everything is controlled by the mouse.

ESCAPE to quit.

To join the attachments files to the emails, you need to drag the paperclip of the attachment to the email.
